title: Ulaginil Miga Uyaram Lyrics Naan Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Ulaginil Miga Uyaram
Singer: Vijay Antony
Lyricist: Annamalai

Ulaginil Miga Uyaram,
Manidhanin siru idhayam
Ninaivugal pala sumakkum,
Nijathinil edhu nadakum

Viral neetum dhisaiyil,
odaadhu nadhigal
Nadhi pogum dhisaiyil..nee odu

Unnai vaati edukkum,
thunbam nooru irukum
Thadai nooru kadandhu..poraadu

Ulaginil Miga Uyaram,
Manidhanin siru idhayam

Kadalinil kalandhidum thuliyae
kavali edhuku ..
Azhaiudan kadandhu nee aadu 
vazhkai unnaku

Uravugal ini unnakedhuku 
ulagam iruku..
Valigalai thaangidum kalli
silaigal iruku

Azhaigal alakalikum odamthaan
kadali thaandi vandhu kairaiyerum
Oosi thulaikum thuni mattum thaan
uduthum aadai endru uruvaagum

Irulil irundhe velicham,
pirakum eppodhum
Ulaginil Miga Uyaram ...

Kanavugal sumandhidum maname,
urakam edharku
Irukudhu unnakoru paadhai,
nadakka thodangu

Thayakangal ini unnakedhuku,
thunindha piragu ..
Nadapadhu nadakattum vazhvil,
kadaka palagu

Idigal idikkum andha vaamthaan
Udaindhu viluvathillai eppodhum
Adiyai thaangi kollum nenjam thaan
adutha adiyai vaithu munnerum

Ninaipin padiye edhuvum, 
nadakum eppodhum

Ulaginil Miga Uyaram,
Manidhanin siru idhayam
Ninaivugal pala sumakkum,
Nijathinil edhu nadakum

Viral neetum dhisaiyil,
 odaadhu nadhigal
Nadhi pogum dhisaiyil ..
nee odu

Unnai vaati edukkum,
thunbam nooru irukum
Thadai nooru kadandhu..
poraadu
